name: fractions
description: A Better Partner Dashboard for Medium
author: Can Durmus <@candurmuss>

scripts.analyze: npm run build:report && parcel serve parcel-bundle-reports/default.html --open
scripts.build: py scripts/set_version.py && npm run build:chromium && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf build/firefox && rm -rf dist/firefox.zip && py scripts/set_version.py && parcel build manifest.json --dist-dir build/firefox && py scripts/update_manifest.py firefox && py scripts/rename_firefox_modules.py && 7z a -tzip dist/firefox.zip -w ./build/firefox/*
scripts.build:chromium: rm -rf build/chromium && rm -rf dist/chromium.zip && py scripts/set_version.py && parcel build manifest.json --dist-dir build/chromium && py scripts/update_manifest.py chromium && 7z a -tzip dist/chromium.zip -w ./build/chromium/*
scripts.build:report: rm -rf build/chromium && rm -rf dist/chromium.zip && py scripts/set_version.py && parcel build manifest.json --dist-dir build/chromium --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer && py scripts/update_manifest.py chromium && 7z a -tzip dist/chromium.zip -w ./build/chromium/*
scripts.watch:chromium: rm -rf build/chromium && py scripts/set_version.py && parcel watch manifest.json --dist-dir build/chromium
